name: LinkUp-Hero
description:
Sorry but the game language now only support Simplified Chinese.

LinkUp-Hero是一个结合连连看和卡牌DBG的游戏机制idea，灵感来自于杀戮尖塔和最近出的哥布林弹球（参考了刷新机制）

LinkUp-Hero is a game combining the gamepaly of link-up game and the deck-building game. Inspired by Slay the spire and Peglin(The refresh mechanism)

这是我本人独立制作的作品，因此它还处于Demo阶段，欢迎发表你的意见~

All made(develop and design) by myself! Your comments are welcome.

试玩版包含1个角色和约15种不同的卡牌，游戏流程（目前只有战斗）大约在10分钟，暂未包含分支路线、遗物等机制（如果找到teammate的话，也许后续会有？）

This is only the prototype verison, where you can only play one hero with about 15 different cards. The workthought time is about 10 minutes. But it's fun. 

Maybe I will add branch route, Relics or other mechanism on future development......maybe.
